During the [[Warring States Period]], the [[Uchiha clan]] would place seal tags surrounding where they are imprisoning their captives. If the prisoners were to touch the bars in their prison, they would catch fire. Any attempts at using ninjutsu would drain the prisoner's chakra.

[[Clan::Uchiha clan| ]]
